column2: an A.M. Eatery////I ordered Spuds Deluxe.  Again
column3: 2 eggs over hash browns and I added bacon & jalapeños.  I should have specified sautéed jalapeños
column5: very hot.  I thought the hash browns were a bit under done. I'd prefer them more crispy.  I'm sure there was bacon in there.  But it was chopped up rather than an actual slice.  Still
column6: very tasty.  And portions were perfect.  Satisfying without distressing.
